meanings.sent1: The cat fets her kittens in the cozy corner.
meanings.sent2: The cow will fets a calf in the spring.

meanings.definition: fet: a young or newly born animal
meanings.sent1: The farm has many fets running around happily.
meanings.sent2: The zoo welcomed a new fet to their animal family.
meanings.sent3: The playful fet chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The forest was alive with the sounds of fets exploring.
meanings.sent5: The pet store had a variety of colorful fets for sale.

meanings.sent1: The proud parents watched their fets play in the park.
meanings.sent2: The teacher cared for all her young fets in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fet got into the cookie jar again.
meanings.sent4: The family reunion was filled with laughter as the fets ran around.
